item.title: Merit Christabel
item.dc:creator: geopadmin
item.description: Merit graduated from Enugu State University of Science and technology with a bachelor’s degree of science in Geoinformatics and Surveying, specializing in land surveying and she also has a Masters in Remote Sensing from the University of Nigeria Enugu Campus. While she was in school she was the Vice president of Nigeria Institution of Student Surveyors. Merit was awarded numerously for her outstanding performances with her involvement in the survey program.
item.content:encoded:
Merit began her surveying career in 2010 as a field rod person. At that time her love for surveying came to be. Merit decided at that moment she wanted to learn as much as possible within the surveying industry, so She took an array of surveying classes and worked closely aside her field chief studying every technique.

A new era of survey technology rose and so did Merit’s career with Geoprecise Services Limited. Merit saw the opportunity to take advantage of the latest field equipment and maximize accuracy and time efficiency. She was running as a solo crew using GPS and a robotic total station. No job was ever too difficult for Merit and she soon became an expert in construction layouts as well.

As the years went on Merit didn’t want to stop at her extensive knowledge in the field, she wanted to expand to the office side of surveying. Merit started to manage and schedule all the field crews and jobs. While working in the office she was able to learn how to draft in AutoCAD. Merit became responsible for reviewing all construction plans and calculating the coordinates for the field crews to layout.

Merit oversees all the day to day field work and drafting load in the office. With Merit’s expertise working in the field, she assists bidding on new potential jobs by giving clients the best competitive prices. Merit prides herself on being a timely and organized person dedicated to doing what is needed at Geoprecise Services limited.

Merit is responsible for administrative management. Merit works hard to provide an excellent customer experience, to ensure smooth office operations and always constantly looking for ways to provide better service to our clients.
Merit has worked for the company for most of her career and is a valuable resource and reference for historical data. She is currently working on becoming a licensed Professional Surveyor.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column]

Skill:

Industrial 90
Construction 75
Commercial 80
[/vc_row]

item.title: Hon. John Okwor Nnam
item.dc:creator: geopadmin
item.description: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart.
item.content:encoded:
Personal Information

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. The first place you think of when you are getting ready. Of all of the celestial bodies that capture our attention and fascination as astronomers when you are getting ready.

Skill:

Industrial 90%
Construction 75%
Commercial 80%

item.title: Surv. Nnam Uchechukwu Godwin (MNIS, MSSSI)
item.dc:creator: geopadmin
item.description: Having had hands-on experience in Geoinformatics and Surveying, he has developed expertise in areas as diverse as Hydrographic Surveying, Cadastral, and Land Surveying, Remote Sensing, Aerial Data Collection, and Real Estate.
item.content:encoded:
Personal Information

After obtaining a First Degree in Geoinformatics and Surveying in 2012, he subsequently obtained a Master Degree in Geoinformatics and Surveying in 2019 and is currently doing his Doctorate Degree in Geoinformatics and Surveying(Remote Sensing) at the University of Nigeria, Enugu Campus, Enugu, Nigeria.

Skill:

Industrial 90%
Construction 75%
Commercial 80%

item.title: Surv. Okwesili Adaeze Merit
item.dc:creator: geopadmin
item.description: Merit graduated from Enugu State University of Science and technology with a bachelor’s degree of science in Geoinformatics and Surveying, specializing in land surveying and she also has a Masters in Remote Sensing from the University of Nigeria Enugu Campus. While she was in school she was the Vice president of Nigeria Institution of Student Surveyors. Merit was awarded numerously for her outstanding performances with her involvement in the survey program.
item.content:encoded:
Personal Information

Merit began her surveying career in 2010 as a field rod person. At that time her love for surveying came to be. Merit decided at that moment she wanted to learn as much as possible within the surveying industry, so She took an array of surveying classes and worked closely aside her field chief studying every technique.

A new era of survey technology rose and so did Merit’s career with Geoprecise Services Limited. Merit saw the opportunity to take advantage of the latest field equipment and maximize accuracy and time efficiency. She was running as a solo crew using GPS and a robotic total station. No job was ever too difficult for Merit and she soon became an expert in construction layouts as well.

As the years went on Merit didn’t want to stop at her extensive knowledge in the field, she wanted to expand to the office side of surveying. Merit started to manage and schedule all the field crews and jobs. While working in the office she was able to learn how to draft in AutoCAD. Merit became responsible for reviewing all construction plans and calculating the coordinates for the field crews to layout.

Merit oversees all the day to day field work and drafting load in the office. With Merit’s expertise working in the field, she assists bidding on new potential jobs by giving clients the best competitive prices. Merit prides herself on being a timely and organized person dedicated to doing what is needed at Geoprecise Services limited.

Merit is responsible for administrative management. Merit works hard to provide an excellent customer experience, to ensure smooth office operations and always constantly looking for ways to provide better service to our clients.
Merit has worked for the company for most of her career and is a valuable resource and reference for historical data. She is currently working on becoming a licensed Professional Surveyor.

Construction 75%

item.title: Hilary .U. Azuh, Esq.
item.dc:creator: geopadmin
item.description: After obtaining a Second Class Honours (Upper Division) Degree from the Faculty of Law, University of Benin in 2017, Miss Hilary Uwazuluonye Azuh proceeded to the Nigerian Law School for the mandatory one year post graduate training. She was called to the Nigerian Bar and was subsequently enrolled as a Barrister and Solicitor of the Supreme Court of Nigeria in November, 2018. She also obtained an introductory certificate from the Chartered Institute of Arbitrators, UK.
item.content:encoded:
Education

The Nigerian Law School, Abuja – B.L

University of Benin, Benin City, Edo State – L.L.B

Area (s) of Expertise

Having had hands-on experience from working in one of the top Law Firms in Nigeria and the public sector as a Graduate Intern in the International and Comparative Law Department of the Federal Ministry of Justice, she has developed expertise in areas as diverse as Alternative Dispute Resolution, International Law, Maritime Law, the Real Estate Sector with particular focus on perfection of title to land, Commercial Law, drafting of complex agreements, Corporate Governance and Compliance and the provision of Company Secretarial Services.

Skill:

Industrial 90%
Construction 75%
Commercial 80%
